Question 38 
 
Match the products in Group 1 with the manufacturing processes in Group 2 listed in the table below.
Group 1 
Group 2 
P)   Acetaldehyde 
I)   Sulfate process 
Q)  Sulfuric acid 
II)  Electric furnace process 
R)  Pulp 
III) Wacker process
 
S)  Phosphorus 
IV) Contact process
[Chemical Technology, 2 Marks]
 
 
(A) P-III, Q-IV, R-I, S-II 
 
(B) 
P-III, Q-I, R-IV, S-II 
 
(C) 
P-IV, Q-I, R-II, S-III  
 
(D) 
P-I, Q-IV, R-II, S-III
